faqs.question: What types of construction vehicles do you rent?
faqs.answer: We provide a wide range of vehicles, including excavators, backhoe loaders, concrete mixers, motor graders, cranes, and more — suitable for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.

faqs.question: How long can I rent a vehicle?
faqs.answer: Rental durations are flexible — from a single day to several months, depending on your project requirements.

faqs.question: How does the rental process work?
faqs.answer: You can request a vehicle online or via phone, receive a quotation, confirm your booking, and our team will deliver the vehicle to your site on schedule.

faqs.question: Do you provide on-site support?
faqs.answer: Yes, our team ensures the vehicle is set up correctly, offers operational guidance, and handles any maintenance issues during the rental period.

faqs.question: How is rental pricing determined?
faqs.answer: Pricing depends on the type of vehicle, duration of rental, and any additional services like delivery or operator support. We provide clear, upfront quotes for every rental.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept bank transfers, UPI payments, and credit/debit cards for both short-term and long-term rentals.

faqs.question: How do you ensure vehicle safety and reliability?
faqs.answer: All vehicles are routinely serviced, inspected, and performance-tested. Safety checks are performed before delivery, and support is provided throughout the rental period.

faqs.question: What support do you provide after rental completion?
faqs.answer: We handle vehicle pickup, inspect for maintenance needs, and provide guidance for future rentals or project planning.
